scripts.getserver: git clone git@github.com:CAU-Kiel-Tech-Inf/socha.git; cd socha; git pull; git checkout hase_und_igel_development; git pull; ant; cd ..; rm -r server; rm -r client; cp -r socha/deploy/server server; echo "password = examplepassword" > server/server.properties; cp -r socha/deploy/simple_client/hase_und_igel_player_new/jar client; return 0;
